content: See this log. I don't understand the error, the curl/jq command works fine for me locally.
Hopefully this is irrelevant now, I've been rewriting this workflow today. (Still not there, I've run into cache issues that need some thought.)
There is another failure, but I think it's because here we have a check that the toolchain matches the docs toolchain. I guess this can be fixed by only running that on the main branch?
Yes. Would you be able to make that change?
Yes, I can. Thanks for the help!
The lastest run is failing, but in a new way (progress, yay!). Something about the remote setup for Mathlib.
This is the issue being discussed at #ecosystem infrastructure > `cache get` fails when depending on Mathlib nightly-testing @ ðŸ’¬
